description: This file is a Java configuration class for audit-related setup in a Spring Boot application, including JPA auditing and a custom authentication filter registration.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that enables JPA auditing and registers a custom authentication filter.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Provides an auditor aware bean for JPA auditing, returning an instance of AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Registers the AppAuthUserFilter for handling authentication via specific URL patterns.
